It looks like i was playing on broken turbofan intakes that were giving 10-20x more intake air then they should of, doesn't look like my designs are gonna work anymore.
Can't seem to find any information anywhere on the differences between all the different control packages in B9... anyone got any info or link (I've googled repeatedly!)

SO i finally have sucess this apears it's goign to be the final design got her balanced otu she flies great once the fuel tank is half drained(as Per expected since its meant to only fly on its way back down whne most its fuel will be depleated) and it fits perfectly in the fairings Tada !

Where you got this wheels?

Touhout Torpedo Modular Multiwheels.
Heh, SABREs are a little nuts. 54t to 90km orbit and return single stage. ( I messed up the return profile & ended up in the sea, so no pics of that ).

Yeah, it's because this is an in-progress alpha. I'd recommend not playing till the full game is released, really, otherwise the fixes will seem trivial in comparison to the amount of time you've played for.
The game is still fun guys. B9- a truly Great Pack!

I had issues where a plane designed with FAR installed will perform better on it than on the stock game.

Flys great too

Can we get a craft file? I tried replicating it myself and it kinda epically failed.

I had issues where a plane designed with FAR installed will perform better on it than on the stock game.

I don't really call that "issues" FAR stuff flies like it's in air, not random magic goop like stock. The only problems that come up are when parts are balanced to allow for the stock game being terrible. You have to take a lot of care designing FAR craft, but having been using it for everything for months I've come to appreciate that too.

I don't really call that "issues" FAR stuff flies like it's in air, not random magic goop like stock. The only problems that come up are when parts are balanced to allow for the stock game being terrible. You have to take a lot of care designing FAR craft, but having been using it for everything for months I've come to appreciate that too.

You have a sort of trade. Rockets become harder to control with FAR.

You have a sort of trade. Rockets become harder to control with FAR.

This is true, but then you need less dV to orbit also. However if it doesn't look like a real rocket to some extent ( ie some crazy contraption to hoist a mad lander/factory thing ) it's probably not going to work, which is something I'm still trying to solve... hence my desire for a giant cargo fuselage.

This is true, but then you need less dV to orbit also. However if it doesn't look like a real rocket to some extent ( ie some crazy contraption to hoist a mad lander/factory thing ) it's probably not going to work, which is something I'm still trying to solve... hence my desire for a giant cargo fuselage.

I officially gave up on trying to orbit with the Heinlein. The plane is almost impossible to coontrol.

Hi. This mod pack is awesome guys, great work.

I have a quick question though. Is it possible to install just the Info Drive? I ask this because I have a separate install where I run some mods that are in early development and are being updated often. I don't have B9 installed on that copy, but would like to be able to use the Info Drive. The Info Drive is very handy and would be a great stand alone mod.

Cheers
